title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of cream-colored velvet. Small allover design in fancy cloth ground of self-color. Interstices filled with cut velvet. Intricate pattern of fine curving lines.
